title: When someone plays your main....
body:
And then he challenges you to the right as local bard master.

In a 1 v 1 all will be decided.
If he wins i forfeit my right as local bard master
If i win, he buys me a skin

I must call all of my strength

http://49.media.tumblr.com/ca647eb2e3ae827ad0df9ca814388f20/tumblr_nkr9m4boY31tiqkyno5_500.gif

lend me yours

replies.body:
To all those who lent me their power, I felt your strength in my battle.

It was a long winded war, for Bard is a resilient creature.

But on the fields of justice, we fought day and night, going without food, or drinking from the fountain, for twenty six minutes until a victor was declared.

Even in the safety of his own tower, the enemy was vanquished, and i reign as the Local Bard Master.

The skin is still to be decided, what does my entourage suggest?

Make him pay for doubting you.

DJ Sona.
But my good-nature cannot permit me to undertake such a harsh and righteously-deserved act!

Hmm. In that case...

Radient Wukong is pretty rad.

I'm thinking Foxfire Ahri right now, it's such a good skin, but i think i will hold onto the right to choose until i see something i really want.  They have to come out with some skin for a champ i main soon right?
